historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 3-205.74.

Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 19-168, in subsec. (a), substituted "POWER eligibility, pursuant to § 4-205.72" for "POWER eligibility"; and added subsec. (a-1).

Temporary Addition of Section

For temporary (225 day) addition of section, see § 4(h) of Self-Sufficiency Promotion Temporary Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Law 12-230, April 20, 1999, law notification 46 DCR 4143).

Emergency Act Amendments

See notes to § 4-205.69.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-241, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 4-201.01.

For history of Law 19-168, see notes under § 4-202.05.

DC CODE § 4-205.74

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: After the Mayor determines that a TANF applicant or recipient may be considered for POWER eligibility, pursuant to § 4-205.72, the Mayor shall provide a medical review of the applicant or recipient to determine whether the applicant or recipient is incapacitated.

After the Mayor determines that a TANF applicant or recipient may be considered for POWER eligibility, pursuant to § 4-205.72a, the Mayor shall provide a review of the applicant or recipient to determine whether the applicant or recipient is eligible for POWER.
The applicant or recipient shall cooperate with obtaining the medical review as a condition of eligibility for POWER.
